summary: day21- what type of music do you think each character likes to listen to?
title: day21- what type of music do you think each character likes to listen to?
body:
let’s not acknowledge i have not done any other day

  • andi: think clairo, declan mckenna, pale waves, roy blair, also fleetwood mac and marina and the diamonds.
  • buffy: radio music lmao. also a huge sza stan & loves lana del rey.
  • cyrus: synth-pop, 2000s pop and nothing else
  • jonah: a mix of classic rock: led zeppelin, van halen, the eagles. then balance that with ed sheeran, shawn mendes, and drake 
  • tj: white boy music and SadBoy rap. listens to youtube disstracks and thinks they go hard. probably cries to post malone songs. 
  • marty: listens only to lil xan and i hate him for that
  • walker: similar to andi’s, but think also brockhampton, daniel caesar
  • amber: a whole pop queen! kim petras, charli xcx, sky ferreira

blog.name: you-get-to-exhale-now-cyrus
blog.title: and i’m gay ❤️🏳️‍🌈
blog.description: theodora / theo || she/her || 18 || bi bi bi || requests always open! || author of Cyrus' Dictionary || masterlist of fics

summary: 31 Days of Andi Mack Day 21: What type of music do you think each character likes to listen to?  Andi: Personally, I see her...
body:
31 Days of Andi Mack Day 21: What type of music do you think each character likes to listen to? 

Andi: Personally, I see her listening to India songs, or something where she can visualize the lyrics. It’s where she draws inspiration from for her crafts

Buffy: Anything with a driving drum line/guitar line. She prefers rock, but hip-hop sneaks its way in there too.

Cyrus: Showtunes all the way, baby! From Dear Evan Hansen to Wicked, he loves them all! Except Cats, he hates that one.

Jonah: As the bi guy that he is, he loves both Taylor Swift and Ed Sheeran. Yes their music is great, but boy does he have a crush on them!

TJ: He has a soft spot for Hamilton, although he would never admit that. Otherwise, he listens to reggae. (Fight me on this one)

tags: since this is a sensitive subject for me personally
i was blinded to how unhealthy my relationship was bc i had so many problematic ideals and internalized notions
and i dont want anyone else to go through that
summary: gentle reminder that jealousy is not an indicator of love
title: gentle reminder that jealousy is not an indicator of love
body:
the last thing I wanna do is rain on people’s headcanons such as those related to “jealous TJ” and Blondie Boy… BUT hear me out, please!

I have a lot of love for y’all, and I truly don’t want anyone to get into unhealthy relationships (like I was in once) because of a romanticized notion of jealousy.

I just had to read/write about jealousy for my health course and I think it’s worth repeating here:

Jealousy is a natural human emotion to have, but it is important to control it in a healthy manner. Jealousy is not actually based on love; it results from factors like “low self-esteem, fear of loss, bruised pride, insecurity, and, in some cases, a sense of “lost property”” (Hatfield & Rapson 1996, cited in Blonna & Carter 2017). These negative feelings should not be sustained in a healthy relationship. Instead, couples can strengthen their relationship by openly discussing jealousy triggers, developing healthy coping strategies to decrease jealousy, and working to strengthen self-esteem and confidence (Blonna & Carter 2017, 288).

So, please just keep this in mind when thinking about any ship, or any real-life relationships (romantic, platonic, etc). By all means, keep at it with the headcanons and theories and everything; but try not to idealize or romanticize unhealthy patterns like possessiveness. Jealousy happens and it doesn’t have to be a big problem, but it’s important to recognize why it is happening and how you can healthily resolve it. :)

blog.name: bandi-mack
blog.title: ready for tomorrow
blog.description: annabelle•16•she/her•love my friends• very Serious art >:^)

summary: who do you ship in Andi Mack? I'm curious (for like which things we can request & stuff)
question: who do you ship in Andi Mack? I'm curious (for like which things we can request & stuff)
answer:
asfdghfs I’m flattered that you’d ask

I’m not sure what specific type of requests you’re referring too, but I’m going to assume that you mean either icons/headers or headcanons since that’s what most of my requests are for (but let me know if you meant something else!). You can pretty much request anything for icons! As for headcanons, that does tend to work better with things I ship lol, so here’s a list of that (hopefully I didn’t forget any)

  • Wandi
  • Bandi
  • Bexie
  • Muffy
  • Tyrus

And for some reason, I think I can do headcanons with any given crack ship within reason (like not Jonah x Bowie lol)

All that said, I’m not super against any ship?? (with the exception of things like Tuffy) If you want content for a ship that I don’t personally ship, chances are I’m still going to give it my best shot, so feel free to send an ask about it anyway! Trust me, I’ll let you know if what you’re asking isn’t something I’m comfortable making or just flat-out can’t make. And uhhhhh I think that’s it! Send me some follow up questions if there’s anything I didn’t answer for you in here :)

tags: do i have specific reasons for these? nope!
summary:
31 days of Andi Mack Day 21: What type of music do you think each character likes to listen to?

  Andi: indie pop, classical;...
body:
31 days of Andi Mack

Day 21: What type of music do you think each character likes to listen to?

Andi: indie pop, classical; musicals

Cyrus: oldies. like, 60s music; musicals

Buffy: pop; hip hop; but she also lowkey likes country music too

Bex: punk rock/alternative, particularly from the 80s and 90s

Bowie: chill indie/folk music; alternative

Jonah: acapella (lmaofnksdks i had to); pop; country; acoustic…Jonah likes a little bit of everything tbh

Walker: jazz; classical; low fi hip hop (basically chill background music that he can listen to while working on his art)

TJ: rap; edm; 70s/80s/90s rock

Amber: pop; edm; lowkey really into musicals

summary:
Cyrus: He wanted to drive us on our first date, but his mom wouldn’t let him drive without parental supervision. 
TJ: I would’ve...
body:
Cyrus: He wanted to drive us on our first date, but his mom wouldn’t let him drive without parental supervision.

TJ: I would’ve been fine. She’s just super overprotective.

Cyrus: You almost ran a red light. Twice.

TJ: I GOT MY PERMIT LAST TUESDAY!

summary: 31 Days If Andi Mack
body:
31 Days If Andi Mack

Day 21: What type of music do you think each character likes to listen to?

This has been edited after I looked at what other people thought for this day because I was dumb when writing this.

Andi: Indie Music. I don’t know any exact bands but yeah.

Buffy: Anything that will get her pumped up before a game.

Cyrus: Classical Music. I feel like it is the only music his parents would allow inside the house, as to not upset any patients. Though when he isn’t at home, he loves busting out some Britney Spears. Also, Musicals, because Cyrus is a theater kid and I don’t know why I didn’t see it.

Jonah: He listens to pop music. Anything that is popular.

Amber: Alternative/Punk. She wants to scare people with her music taste.

Tj: Rap Music. I also saw people saying Panic! At The Disco and Hamilton, and I’m so sorry I forgot the iconic Tj-is-a-history-nerd meme-thing.

tags: or maybe this painkillers are to strong
will i really write the fic
I could if only i had both hands working
it took me 40 mins to write this with just my left hand
summary: Okay, but what if the reason why TJ never talked to Marty was because he had a crush on him? And he was probably his first crush...
body:
Okay, but what if the reason why TJ never talked to Marty was because he had a crush on him? And he was probably his first crush so he was just too embarrassed and awkward to talk to him.

And the reason why he dislike Buffy making into the boys basketball team was because he blamed her for “taking Marty spot” and losing the only excuse to talk and hang out with Marty?

But then he meet Cyrus and started crushing on him? And since he no longer had a crush on Marty he realized what a jerk he had been to Buffy and then he decided to apologize to her. (and also to get in Cyrus good graces)

Should I do it? Should I write the fanfic? It feels like i’m cheating on Tyrus (and Muffy) but what the hell, I ship it.
